title: Notre Dame reopens with joyful ceremony and dicey diplomacy
content: The cathedral is reopening Saturday with a ceremony attended by French officials, foreign dignitaries, clergy, donors — and President-elect Donald Trump.
summary: The cathedral is reopening Saturday with a ceremony attended by French officials, foreign dignitaries, clergy, donors — and President-elect Donald Trump.

title: Zelensky meets with Trump in Paris as he tries to build support for Ukraine
content: The meeting marks the first time Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has joined President-elect Donald Trump in-person since the U.S. election.
summary: The meeting marks the first time Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has joined President-elect Donald Trump in-person since the U.S. election.

title: Syrian rebels threaten Damascus, Assad from north and south
content: The rapid advance on Damascus is the greatest threat yet to President Bashar al-Assad’s 24-year rule.
summary: The rapid advance on Damascus is the greatest threat yet to President Bashar al-Assad’s 24-year rule.

title: Live Briefing: Syrian rebels gain in south, say they’ll besiege Damascus
content: Syrian rebel groups reported gains in the country’s south on Saturday, advancing in Daraa and putting pressure on the capital, Damascus.
summary: Syrian rebel groups reported gains in the country’s south on Saturday, advancing in Daraa and putting pressure on the capital, Damascus.

title: A major cocaine transit country is halting U.S. anti-drug cooperation
content: Paraguay’s antidrug agency has decided to halt cooperation with the United States, a significant blow to U.S. efforts to curb organized crime in the country.
summary: Paraguay’s antidrug agency has decided to halt cooperation with the United States, a significant blow to U.S. efforts to curb organized crime in the country.

title: South Korea’s president avoids impeachment after martial law misstep
content: A vote to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol failed after a boycott by his party, but opponents vow to punish him for his short-lived declaration of martial law.
summary: A vote to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol failed after a boycott by his party, but opponents vow to punish him for his short-lived declaration of martial law.

title: Iran withdraws some military commanders from Syria

title: Asian farmworkers are being killed in Israel’s embattled border regions
Asian farmworkers are being killed in Israel’s embattled border regions
content: Despite repeated protests from their countries, Israel has continued to let migrant laborers work in high-risk military zones.
summary: Despite repeated protests from their countries, Israel has continued to let migrant laborers work in high-risk military zones.

Austin Tice, journalist missing in Syria, is alive, mother says, citing ‘vetted’ source

content: The Tice family spoke in Washington after meeting with U.S. officials, urging the Biden administration to “follow through” on plans to pursue his release.

title: As lawmakers move to impeach South Korean President Yoon, what happens next?
content: Calls are growing for South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol’s ouster after he declared then rescinded martial law. Here’s how an impeachment would work.
summary: Calls are growing for South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol’s ouster after he declared then rescinded martial law. Here’s how an impeachment would work.

title: Many targeted for removal by Trump can’t be deported, ICE data shows
content: Some would-be deportees’s home countries won’t take them or limit cooperation with ICE. Others have received reprieves or deferrals from immigration judges.
summary: Some would-be deportees’s home countries won’t take them or limit cooperation with ICE. Others have received reprieves or deferrals from immigration judges.

title: Romanian court annuls presidential vote after Russian interference claims
content: Calin Georgescu won the first round of the election after being propelled by TikTok. Romania’s security services pointed to “Russian hybrid actions.”
summary: Calin Georgescu won the first round of the election after being propelled by TikTok. Romania’s security services pointed to “Russian hybrid actions.”

title: Why capture of Syrian city Homs could be key moment in rebel offensive
content: Capturing Homs, Syria’s third-largest city, would be a major victory in a rebel offensive that already has captured Aleppo and Hama.
summary: Capturing Homs, Syria’s third-largest city, would be a major victory in a rebel offensive that already has captured Aleppo and Hama.

title: After taking two key cities, Syrian rebels set their sights on Homs
content: After Hayat Tahrir al-Sham gained control of Hama, rebels are seeking to take Homs, as they continue their breakneck advance across Syria.
summary: After Hayat Tahrir al-Sham gained control of Hama, rebels are seeking to take Homs, as they continue their breakneck advance across Syria.

title: Health officials grapple with deadly mystery ‘Disease X’ in Congo

title: Rebel advance in Syria threatens to unravel Putin’s previous triumph

France’s Macron rules out resigning, will tap new prime minister
content: The French president said he would name a new prime minister in days, as he scolded the far-right and left factions that toppled the government in a no-confidence vote.
